Radiance

A golden glow touches my heart,
Always there no matter how far apart,
Gracefully lifting my spirits and brightening my days,
It shines from my most perfect angel, who never ceases to amaze
Her beautiful skin is soft and fair, like a smooth wave to the sight
Her gentle touch is warm and soothing, like cocoa on a winter night
Her golden locks swirl festively, like loose grass in a fall meadow
Her rosy cheeks beam, like spring flowers that continue to grow
I am so lucky to have her, she's a dream come true
I could never want anything when I have you
I hope you know that I am head over heels
Isabel Wickliffe, I love you for realz
